column4: why cannot i get respond from computer which is in the same ip range
first of all verify the interface is up, can you ping your on ip address?
even better, are you getting leases from the dcp server?
pardon?get lease?
on a terminal type dhclient, it should give you an ip address, that is a lease
otherwise, maybe a firewall on the other box?
yes,it has a firewall
can you ping your default gateway?
sure ican
then you should set the firewall to permit ICMP packets from your ubuntu box
i will give it a try
i have tried that,it didnot work
if you can ping the gateway
yeah,i can,he can too,we got the firewall closed
no,he can ping the gateway,but not me
maybe you have the firewall?
iptables, firestarter
as i said fw issue
it is,we are in the same ip range,222.140.5.*,got the same gateway222.140.5.94
fw??
firewall
